jd: From: Gurpreet, Absolute IT gurpreet@absoluting.com Reply to: gurpreet@absoluting.com Job DescriptionEPMO Project Manager Requested near Lansing, Michigan - Candidate must be able to interview Onsite or can't apply.. Candidate must have an active and an updated LinkedIn ID with a picture (REQUIRED!!) They must be local and able to go onsite. The state of Michigan is seeking a EPMO Project Manager with at least 5 years of experience, to work a HYBRID role in Lansing, Michigan.Candidates must be local or within 2 hours of driving distance of Lansing. There will be 2 interviews for this project, the 1st is virtual, and the 2nd is a required onsite interview (please do not submit candidates who are “local” but can’t interview onsite). Candidates should be comfortable with 2 days a week onsite, with the remaining days as remote. Job DescriptionThe State of Michigan is looking for a Project Manager 3Interviews: In-person REQUIRED, second round MS Virtual TeamsDuration: 1 year with possible extensionPosition location: Lansing, MI. Hybrid Role with 2 days onsite from day 1 - Tuesday and WednesdayLocal ONLYClear and concise communication skills required.Top Skills & Years of Experience Required:• Minimum 5 years’ experience managing development and infrastructure projects• Strong Knowledge of project management processes and methodologies• Strong experience managing project scope schedule and cost -• Experience developing cost estimates, and project’s resources requirement• Great communication and leadership skills
